query.statement:
SELECT B.MAIN_ITEM_CODE1 AS CD , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0006' AND CODE = B.MAIN_ITEM_CODE1) NM , COUNT(*) CNT
, FSM_TERM_MENU_EVAL_NAME_FUN(#MENU_CLASS# , #COST_TYPE#, #MENU_TYPE#,#MEAL#,#MENU_DATE#,#MENU_DATE#,'AND C.MAIN_ITEM_CODE1= ''' || B.MAIN_ITEM_CODE1 || '''') INFO
, FSM_TERM_MENU_EVAL_NAME_FUN(#MENU_CLASS# , #COST_TYPE#, #MENU_TYPE#,#MEAL#,#MENU_FDATE#,#MENU_TDATE#,'AND C.MAIN_ITEM_CODE1= ''' || B.MAIN_ITEM_CODE1 || '''') INFO
FROM FSM_TERM_MENU_RECIPE A, FSR_STD_RECIPE_MST B WHERE A.RECIPE_CD = B.RECIPE_CD AND A.TERM_MENU_CD IN ( SELECT TERM_MENU_CD FROM FSM_TERM_MENU_MST WHERE MENU_CLASS = #MENU_CLASS# AND COST_TYPE = #COST_TYPE# AND MENU_TYPE = #MENU_TYPE# AND MEAL = #MEAL#
AND MENU_DATE = #MENU_DATE#
AND MENU_DATE BETWEEN #MENU_FDATE# AND #MENU_TDATE#
) AND MAIN_ITEM_CODE1 NOT IN ( SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = 'FS0036' ) GROUP BY B.MAIN_ITEM_CODE1 HAVING COUNT(*)>1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC,B.MAIN_ITEM_CODE1
